statements: SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_history FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_patients, AVG(patient_age) as avg_age FROM patient_medical_records;
SELECT patient_name, SUBSTRING(patient_history, 1, 50) as truncated_history FROM patient_medical_records;
SELECT * FROM patient_medical_records WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND patient_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, name, dob FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT name, address, dob FROM Patients ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT record_id, record_date, diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE treatment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, name FROM Patients WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM MedicalRecords GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_records > 1;
SELECT Patients.name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id WHERE MedicalRecords.treatment = 'Surgery';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE record_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT diagnosis FROM MedicalRecords WHERE physician_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE record_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC;

SELECT Patients.first_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis, Medications.medication_name FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id JOIN Medications ON MedicalRecords.record_id = Medications.record_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, MAX(record_date) AS latest_record_date FROM MedicalRecords;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, specialty, first_name, last_name FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, status FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';

SELECT patients.first_name, patients.last_name, medical_history.visit_date, medical_history.diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE medical_history.diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';

SELECT doctors.first_name, doctors.last_name, appointments.appointment_date FROM appointments JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND appointments.appointment_date <= '2022-06-30';

SELECT patients.first_name, patients.last_name, appointments.appointment_date, appointments.status FROM patients LEFT JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.status='Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis, treatment FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';

SELECT doctors.specialization, doctors.first_name, doctors.last_name, appointments.appointment_date FROM doctors INNER JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id ORDER BY appointments.appointment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' AND treatment IS NOT NULL;

SELECT doctors.first_name, doctors.last_name, COUNT(appointments.appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM doctors LEFT JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id GROUP BY doctors.doctor_id;

SELECT prescriptions.medication, patients.first_name, prescriptions.prescription_date FROM prescriptions INNER JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE prescriptions.prescription_date > '2022-01-01';
